cause.description:
our cause is to raise money for local charities that we would like to support, in 2007 we are supporting the orchard trust to help them build a hypdrotheropy pool, next year we hope to do a jail break, but don't yet know for which charity
1. raising money
2. having fun
3. beliving in God to show us the right path
cause.mission: raise money for other charities whist we have fun
cause.name: team innuendo
